result.description: Valoon offers a construction communication and documentation platform that integrates directly with WhatsApp to streamline site management. By allowing field workers to document progress, defects, and tasks via their existing chat app, Valoon structures unstructured communication into professional reports and project data automatically.
customer_problems: Chaos and information loss in unstructured WhatsApp groups
Subcontractors refusing to install or learn complex construction apps
Time-consuming manual creation of daily construction reports
Lack of legally secure documentation for disputes
differentiators: Zero-barrier adoption: Subcontractors use WhatsApp, no new app installation required
Automated conversion of chat messages (text, voice, photos) into structured documentation
Seamless synchronization between instant messaging and project management dashboards
key_features: WhatsApp integration for photo and voice note uploads
Automated generation of daily construction reports (Bautagesberichte)
Centralized project dashboard for office teams
pain_points: Administrative overhead for site managers after site visits
Difficulty tracking task completion with external partners
Incomplete documentation leading to liability risks
use_cases: Reporting a defect on-site by snapping a photo and sending it to the Valoon WhatsApp bot
Automatically compiling a daily site report from chat logs
Assigning tasks to subcontractors without requiring them to log into a portal
Archiving project communication for legal security
value_propositions: Saves significant time on administrative documentation
Ensures high adoption rates among non-tech-savvy field workers
Provides a single source of truth for project communication
Reduces legal risk through comprehensive, automated archiving
